覆.definition: to cover; to overflow; to overturn; to capsize

覆巢之下無完卵.pinyin: fu4 chao2 zhi1 xia4 wu2 wan2 luan3
覆巢之下無完卵.definition: lit. when the nest is upset no egg is left intact (idiom); fig. when one falls in disgrace the whole family is doomed

覆巢無完卵.definition: lit. when the nest overturns no egg remains intact; no member escapes unscathed from a family disaster (idiom)

覆水難收.definition: spilt water is difficult to retrieve (idiom); it's no use crying over spilt milk; what's done is done and can't be reversed; the damage is done; once divorced, there's no reuniting

覆疊.definition: to overlap; to overlay; cascaded (thermodynamic cycle)

覆轍.definition: the tracks of a cart that overturned; (fig.) a path that led to failure in the past

覆迭.definition: variant of 覆疊|覆叠[fu4 die2]

覆述.definition: variant of 複述|复述[fu4 shu4]
